channel.title: Facebook
channel.description:
So not sure if you have been on facebook recently, but there's this stupid thing called truth is. I think it is quite possibly the most stupid thing since planking. Facebook fads are the worst... I also hate the new facebook layout. I feel lost.
ITT: Things you hate about facebook.

item.title: Facebook
item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

[quote=“Hash1 Single, post:47, topic:427293”][quote author=Cole1497 link=topic=529994.msg3882987#msg3882987 date=1326203868]
Not at all, you halfwit. He said it was the most stupid thing [size=36pt]since[/size] planking, which in no way even hints that he’s saying “planking came from facebook”.
[/quote]

since/sins/
Preposition:
In the intervening period between (the time mentioned) and the time under consideration, typically the present.[/quote]
His implying it became stupid since planking came along, before that it was fine but things on facebook spread like wildfire.

Read full topic

OT: its buggy to hell, timelines shit, fb app blows ass for the blackberry.

Blackberry blows ass on its own.

That’s why RIM are so huge? Nah i agree but seriously you sir do not know how to backup what your trying to say
[/quote]
RIM is 14$ a stock. Get off me.[/quote]

item.title: Facebook
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

JavaTC:

I check it every couple of days, rather be pending time on Skype with my friends than talking to 200 people I barley know over a social networking site. It annoys me that my friend ONLY posts to get likes, like 3-4 a day all bragging about his new $2000 computer, or how he pierced his goddamn ear. I don’t think it’s a bad site, but it’s abused more than the comment rating system on Youtube.

Then again… well its hard to tell…

Read full topic
